content:
User: I'm thinking about how Google Drive view links work; they display content in a browser. Maybe I need to use "Browse Page" with a query like "markdown content" to get the text.

Grok: The content might be in a <pre> tag in the HTML, so I'm wondering if I can set the query to "find all text within pre tags." But the query should be natural language, so maybe "entire markdown file content" works better.
